properties.title: Pumptrack Bellwald
properties.abstract: Modern playground and meeting place at the same time, the pumptrack offeres an ideal complement to the existing sport and leisure activities in Bellwadl. It is asphalted and has tranfer jumps and a quadruple curve
properties.description:
Once a tennis court, today one of the largest pump tracks in the Valais with a total area of around 600 square metres: the popular pump track in Bellwald has already lived up to its name as a playground for everyone. It simultaneously functions as an ideal meeting place because its location is perfect: on the edge of the forest, amidst the Bellwald sports and leisure facilities and close to the barbecue area, playground and a large car park.

Of course, the Bellwald pump track also has a lot to offer in terms of sport: as the first asphalted facility in the canton, it is suitable for all roller wheeled means of transport. Ground contours, transfers, steep walls and a quadruple curve make it a real highlight. Tip: if you spontaneously feel like «pumping» around, you can rent a suitable means of transport from the sports and leisure facilities.

Length: 200 m / Area: 600 m2 / Wave and curve height: 30-120 cm / Surface: concrete.
properties.name: Bellwald Tourismus
